reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Tailoring project for 8 PWDs at Axum city

description.narrative: This is an IGA project for 8 physically disabled persons in tailoring. The group intends to purchase tailoring machines and raw materials for the project. They will produce garments which will be sold to tourists and the local community. The group already has skills in tailoring after undergoing a 3 months training in tailoring from ECDD's USAID funded project STEP. There is a ready market in Axum which is one of the well known tourist destinations in Ethiopia. The local Micro + Small Business Development A gency has pledged to provide a shed where the group can operate from.
